Lunarpine laughed "Me win him over?" He was almost shocked at the way 
she thought. "In case you've forgotten, He attacked Us." In the wolfs 
mind it was the raptor that had to earn his trust not the other way 
around.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> (Thanks a bunch there Cyberwolf. I start collage and now I have RPG 
> class to study for too. Man, this just isn't my year. LOL)
> 
> Ice::
> She opened her mind to Razor Claw and rea his thoughts. "No, we are 
> not plotting against you. My thoughts are genuine. We are friends 
> here and will stick together. I am only wishing to learn to fight 
> better. Will you join us outside and help me to learn?"
> 
> She looked at Lunarpine. "Our friend still thinks like a predacon. 
> But don't worry, I'll help you win him over." she smiled and looked 
> around. She liked the ice and snow. It suited her well.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine followed her outside, "It's nice and warm up here." He 
> was 
> > glad to finally have her alone, there were to many distractions 
> > inside.He transformed to wolf and stood beside her. "We've got a 
> > little time before class so you wanna take a walk?"
> > 
> > Razor Claw was paranoid about his new "friends" "They probably 
went 
> > outside to plot against me, I'll be ready.
> > 
> > (I'll private Email you the class notes so we don't have to sit 
for 
> > hours for a short class.)
> >
